title: Casa Barahona
content: This spacious holiday home features 4 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, 2 bathrooms with a bath, a washing machine and a fireplace. Guests can enjoy the ambience of the surroundings, an outdoor dining area and a private pool.

title: Casa Bahoruco
content: This cozy holiday home features 2 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven and a bathroom. Guests can enjoy the shared outdoor dining area and the communal pool.

title: Casa Bohechio
content: This cozy holiday home features a bedroom, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a bathroom and a fireplace. Guests can enjoy the shared outdoor dining area and the communal pool.
